## Git and GitHub

- terminal commands:
  - `ls`: listing all files of current directory
  - `cd`: change directory
  - `..`: parent directory
  
- example GitHub repo: <https://github.com/willju-wangqian/S2026_brfss_prject>
  - `git add`: select files to be tracked by git
  - `git commit`: create a checkpoint for your project
  - `git push`: push local commits to the remote
